NN/IT_Cause: ETL lag or ingestion pipeline failure
Local_Effect: Incorrect turnaround time parameters in published dataset
System_Effect: Turnaround planning tools use outdated assumptions
Ops_Effect: Ground delays and potential ground operations constraint violations
Detection_Method: Automated dataset freshness and consistency checks
Mitigation/Compensation: Rollback to last approved dataset + initiate ERP bulletin to operators/MRO

Failure_Mode: Incomplete training coverage for ATA 02 content model
NN/IT_Cause: Training material outdated or missing modules
Local_Effect: Staff misunderstand where to find or place safety-relevant ops information
System_Effect: Misplaced or missing updates to safety-relevant documents
Ops_Effect: Delays or errors in applying correct procedures/limits
Mitigation/Compensation: Regular review of training materials against ATA 02 overview and safety framework + mandatory refresher

Failure_Mode: Insufficient training on ERP and degraded ops procedures
Local_Effect: Staff do not recognize when to trigger ERP or how to apply degraded ops fallbacks
System_Effect: Information issues not contained promptly leading to extended exposure to incorrect data
Ops_Effect: Runtime monitoring alerts and incidents not handled correctly
Mitigation/Compensation: Scenario-based ERP/degraded ops drills with documented outcomes and updated materials
